name: The Landscaper
description:
The Landscaper Demo 1.0

Turn dirt tiles to grass by walking on them. Arrow keys to move, space to jump (the longer you hold space the higher you jump. Tapping space will do a small hop). XBox One controllers (and maybe others) are also supported.

Some objects work by pressing up or down such as animal signs. Diagonal to right to jump off of jet ski. Complete each level optimally to get the highest score.

Pick up a bone to friend dogs within 5 seconds.

Press 'S' to skip intro.
